column2: I see a little boy on a stool trying to reach the cookie jar . 1560_7000
he's got one in his hand that to his little sister . [+ gram] 7068_10400
and the stool is falling over tipping . 10460_14085
and <the lady is> [//] (gue)ss mama is standin(g) by the sink
and the water's running over on the floor . 23035_25696
and outside you can see the walk and the shrubbery . 25696_31812
and there's some dishes setting on the counter . 31812_37945
and that's all I see . [+ exc] 37945_39890
